Text: Great job as usual phatwarez. All your NFL uploads are really appreciated. 1.26 gigs a nice manageable size too. Well done!

Read your comments about tenyardtorrents and the excellent job you did uploading games last season. Personally I can't stand the Nazis who run TYT. The slightest criticism and you get banned, like I did. Any luck in finding an alternative source?

Yup I have a few new sources of NFL games i've been working on for a few weeks, independent from TYT. I'll probably stick to this resolution/bit rate for regular releases, I just don't have the setup to encode 16 1080p games a week.

I'm slowly clearing out my bdrip queue so i'll be able to dedicated my time solely to NFL games. I WILL be taking requests for individual games, email me.

Don't forget to donate! =) Seedboxes aren't cheap.

The audio and video is not only out of sync, and if you try to fix it manually in VLC it doesn't matter since there are glitch/skips which throw it back out of sync. This is all within the first 15 minutes.

I've tried various players and computers. 

Unwatchable.
